text: waqal lahum nubiuhuma: 'iina ealamatan mulkih 'an yatiakum alsunduq aladhi fih altawrat -wkan 'aedawuhum qad antazaeuh minhama- fih tam'aninat min rabikum tuthbit qulub almukhlasina, wafih baqiat min bed 'ashya' tarakaha al musaa wal haruna, mithl aleasa wfutat al'alwah tahmiluh almalayikatu. 'iina fi dhalik li'aezam burhan lakum ealaa aikhtiar talut mlkana ealaykum bi'amr allaha, 'iin kuntum musadiqin biallah warusuliha
